mapper.insert: insert into bd_check_cases (ccid, checkid, ajid, psgroupid, jydp, zzpcdf, zzzldj, dpr, dpsj, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag ) values (#{ccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jydp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzpcdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzzldj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dpsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update bd_check_cases set checkid = #{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ajid = #{ajid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, psgroupid = #{psgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jydp = #{jydp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zzpcdf = #{zzpcdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zzzldj = #{zzzldj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dpr = #{dpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dpsj = #{dpsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ccid = #{ccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b.bt,date_format(b.fqsj, '%Y/%m/%d') fqsj,b.pclx, b.pcrw,fn_get_username(b.fqr) fqrmc ,a.ccid, a.checkid, a.ajid, a.psgroupid, a.jydp, a.zzpcdf, a.zzzldj,a.dpr,date_format(a.dpsj, '%Y/%m/%d') dpsj, a.create_by, date_format(a.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, a.update_by, date_format(a.update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, a.remarks, a.flag, b.bt ggmc, (select u.xm from bd_check_pros t,sd_user u where t.proid =u.yhid and t.checkid = a.checkid and t.groupid = a.psgroupid and t.sfzz = '1' limit 1) teamleadername, (select GROUP_CONCAT(u.xm SEPARATOR ';') xm from bd_check_pros t,sd_user u where t.proid =u.yhid and t.checkid = a.checkid and t.groupid = a.psgroupid and t.sfzz != '1' GROUP BY t.groupid limit 1) teammatenames ,c.ah,c.gsfy,c.cbbm,c.cbr,c.ay,c.xz,c.lx,c.jafs,DATE_FORMAT(c.jasj, '%Y/%m/%d') jasj,c.relatedcasecount,(select count(1) from bd_check_cases x where x.ajid = a.ajid and x.jydp is not null) pcjl from bd_check_cases a,bd_check b,bd_middle_case c,sd_user u,bd_check_groups g where a.checkid = b.checkid and a.ajid = c.ajid and b.fqr = u.yhid and a.psgroupid = g.cgid and a.ccid = #{ccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select zzjgid,zzjgmc, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.xz='刑事') c1 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.xz='民事') c2 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.xz='行政') c3 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.xz='赔偿') c4 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.xz='执行') c5 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc) c6 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='优秀') c7, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='合格') c8, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='瑕疵') c9, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='差错') c10 from sd_organization a order by fjm

select zzjgid,zzjgmc, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.lx='抗诉') c1 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.lx='发回改判') c2 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.lx='再审') c3 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.lx='审理周期一年半以上') c4 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.lx='执行异议复议') c5 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc) c6 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='优秀') c7, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='合格') c8, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='瑕疵') c9, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and c.checkid = #{ggid} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='差错') c10 from sd_organization a order by fjm

select zzjgid,zzjgmc, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.xz='刑事') c1 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.xz='民事') c2 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.xz='行政') c3 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.xz='赔偿') c4 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.xz='执行') c5 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc ) c6 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='优秀') c7, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='合格') c8, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='瑕疵') c9, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='差错') c10 from sd_organization a order by fjm

select zzjgid,zzjgmc, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.lx='抗诉') c1 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.lx='发回改判') c2 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.lx='再审') c3 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.lx='审理周期一年半以上') c4 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c1.lx='执行异议复议') c5 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc ) c6 , (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='优秀') c7, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='合格') c8, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='瑕疵') c9, (select count(1) from bd_check_cases c,bd_middle_case c1 where c.ajid = c1.ajid and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') >= #{fqsj1} and date_format(c.create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') <= #{fqsj2} and c1.gsfy = a.zzjgmc and c.zzzldj='差错') c10 from sd_organization a order by fjm

select itemid, (select psnr from bd_scoretable_items x where x.itemid = a.itemid) psnr, (select pfbz from bd_scoretable_items x where x.itemid = a.itemid) pfbz, (select fz from bd_scoretable_items x where x.itemid = a.itemid) fz, count(1) kfaj,sum(kf) ljkf,sum(kf)/count(1) pjkf from bd_check_score a , bd_check_records r where a.crid = r.crid and r.checkid = #{ggid} group by itemid order by sum(kf) desc
